title: Fort Union National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               Current Park News & Events        Officers Quarters Fort Union Fort Union National Monument   Â        Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 30, 2016  August 10, 2016  Did you know there are 15 National Parks and 3 National Historic Trails in New Mexico?  Over 1,714,000 visitors enjoyed their time at a New Mexico National Park last year.  On Wednesday August 10, 2016 come and visit with rangers from your New Mexico National Parks at the Fort Union Drive-In outdoor movie theater in Las Vegas NM.   July 08, 2016  Soldiering on the Frontier  Join Rick Lohsen of the Artillery Company of New Mexico as he invites you to step into the shoes of a soldier in 15th U.S. Infantry in 1870. This program will be held at the CCHP/Santa Fe Trail Interpretive Center, 116 Bridge Street, Las Vegas, New Mexico, Thursday, July 21, 2016, 7:00 PM.
